description: This file is a CMake script defining a custom function 'CreateLink' that creates symbolic links during the build configuration process. It includes logic to handle different CMake versions and ensures directory creation before linking.
external_files: CMake modules and commands such as 'cmake_parse_arguments', 'get_filename_component', 'file(MAKE_DIRECTORY)', 'INSTALL(CODE)', and 'file(CREATE_LINK)'

methods.name: CreateLink
methods.description: Creates a symbolic link from a target to a specified link location, handling different CMake versions for compatibility.
